quotes.quote: It is only when we no longer compulsively need someone that we can have a real relationship with them.
I love my eyes when you look into them. I love my name when you say it. I love my heart when you touch it. I love my life when you are in it.
Treasure your relationships, not your possessions.
A successful relationship requires falling in love multiple times, but always with the same person.
The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
The most exciting, challenging and significant relationship of all is the one you have with yourself.
I love the way you make me so happy, and the ways you show you care. I love the way you say, ''I love you'', and the way you are always there.
Being deeply moved by someone gives you the strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
Do what you did in the beginning of the relationship and there won't be an end.
The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our hearts are connected.
If you ever asked me the number of times you have crossed my mind, I would say only ONCE. You know why? You came and never left.
When you're in a relationship and it's good, even if nothing else in your life is right, you feel like your whole world is complete.
Men always want to be a woman's first love â€“ women like to be a man's last romance.
No relationship is perfect, ever. There are always some ways you have to bend, to compromise, to give something up in order to gain something greater.
Even though there are plenty of fish in the sea, you are without a doubt the perfect fit for me.
For the two of us, home isn't a place. It is a person. And we are finally home.
Each relationship nurtures a strength or weakness within you.
I would rather spend one lifetime with you than face all the ages of this world alone.
A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
It is the things in common that make relationships enjoyable, but it is the little differences that make them interesting.
Maybe you don't need the whole world to love you. Maybe you just need one person.
You're my reflection, all I see is you.
We fell in love. Mine became ours, minutes turned to hours, chocolates and flowers, you made me brave when life created a coward.
In relationships, the little things are the big things.
Let's commit the perfect crime. I'll steal your heart and you steal mine.
To know when to go away and when to come closer is the key to any lasting relationship.
I'd rather die tomorrow than live a hundred years without knowing you.
When I saw you, I was afraid to meet you. When I met you, I was afraid to kiss you. When I kissed you, I was afraid to love you. Now that I love you, I'm afraid to lose you.
I love the way we look together â€“ as sweet as sugar and as nice as ice.
A guy and a girl can be just friends, but at one point or another, they will fall for each other. Maybe temporarily, maybe at the wrong time, maybe too late, or maybe forever.
Three things I want in a relationship: Eyes that won't cry, lips that won't lie, and love that won't die.
We can improve our relationships with others by leaps and bounds if we become encouragers instead of critics.
Once you find someone to share your ups and downs, downs are almost as good as ups.
In the end there doesn't have to be anyone who understands you. There just has to be someone who wants to.
It takes one person to forgive, it takes two people to be reunited.
If I could reach up and hold a star for every time you've made me smile. The entire sky would be in the palm of my hand.
When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.
If you're in a relationship and you want to make it work, you have to be a little selfless at times.
A great relationship doesn't happen because of the love you had in the beginning, but how well you continue building love until the end.
When you're in a relationship, you're always surrounded by a ring of circumstances... joined together by a wedding ring, or in a boxing ring.
The ultimate test of a relationship is to disagree but to hold hands.
A relationship is like a house. When a lightbulb burns out you do not go and buy a new house, you fix the light bulb.
There are lots of people who can call you by your name but there is only one person who can make it sound so special.
I don't have the money to buy you the world, But I am prepared to share that world with you.
Personal relationships are the fertile soil from which all advancement...all success... all achievement in real life grows.
Best relationship: Talk like best friends, play like children, argue like husband and wife, protect each other like brother and sister.
A relationship is like a rose. How long it lasts, no one knows.
Having someone wonder where you are when you don't come home at night is a very old human need.
